mapper.select: select id, electricity_id, cell_no, type, status, msg, uid, username, create_time from t_electricity_cabinet_hysics_oper_record where id = #{id}
select id, electricity_id, cell_no, type, status, msg, uid, username, create_time from t_electricity_cabinet_hysics_oper_record limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into t_electricity_cabinet_hysics_oper_record(electricity_id, cell_no, type, status, msg, uid, username, create_time) values (#{electricityId}, #{cellNo}, #{type}, #{status}, #{msg}, #{uid}, #{username}, #{createTime})
mapper.update:
update t_electricity_cabinet_hysics_oper_record
electricity_id = #{electricityId},
cell_no = #{cellNo},
type = #{type},
status = #{status},
msg = #{msg},
uid = #{uid},
username = #{username},
create_time = #{createTime},
where id = #{id}
